Header: 61 Army personnel leaves for UN missions
Content: A new contingent of 61 Army personnel including 11 Officers under the Phase 6 of the UN Mission of South Sudan left this morning for South Sudan. The Sri Lanka troops will serve at a South Sudan-based Hospital, equipped with necessary components for secondary care medical services.Â  Several senior officers were at the airport to greet them off this morning. The troops left the country by an Ethiopian flight.
